article: How to Use the Apple App Store on iPhone: Beginners Guide
intro: The App Store is used to download free or paid apps on your Apple iPhone. This is different from the Apple Store app, which is used to shop for other Apple products and accessories. You can use the App Store to find fun games, productivity tools, and even mobile versions of popular Apple or Microsoft software. This wikiHow will show you how to use the iPhone App Store to download apps, update apps, and manage your app purchases.
